thread.title: Defense in Nanny Case Highlights Her Condition After Killings

author: Corinne Ramey
title: Defense in Nanny Case Highlights Her Condition After Killings
text:
Defense attorneys representing the New York City nanny charged with murder began presenting their case Thursday, reconstructing the days after the woman fatally stabbed her two young charges on Oct. 25, 2012.
Yoselyn Ortega, 55 years old, is accused of the murder of Leo and Lucia “Lulu” Krim, 2- and 6-year-old children who lived in a luxury apartment building on Manhattan’s Upper West Side.
Ms....
